resources.string:
Enable Real Optimizer to:
 1. Boost device and cool the phone down
 2. Stop battery draining apps
 3. Completely clean system cache
 
 We solemnly promise:
 Real Optimizer NEVER collects any privacy information.
 
 Please note that:
 There is a standart confirmation procedure when enabling Accessibility Service on all Android device. If you receive these privacy warnings, just ignore them please.
